argument.name: filename
argument.description: The name of the file to receive the debug data. Character

argument.name: dump_variables
argument.description: Optional. Default = .F. Logical. .T. = Save variable information, .F. = Do not save variable information.

page.description: Start writing all debuggable executed xbasic commands to a file.
page.discussion: The XBASIC_TRACE_START() function writes all debuggable executed Xbasic code lines to a file.
